description: A collection of circles in a tilted, roughly rectangular formation that tapers to a triangular point at the top; there are also two adjacent circles below the bottom of the rectangular formation and a much smaller rectangular formation below those circles. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a green triangle toward the top of the rectangular formation and a brown triangle below the center.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
